distribution_pattern: Northern CA only.
product_description: Croissant:: sold in self serve cases and 4 pack clamshell package. Topping (egg spray). Contains Milk, Eggs, Wheat. This information is from the new label.    Manufactured by Bakers of Paris, Brisbane, CA for Whole Foods Markets.
